song.title: Dizzzruptor part 3 (Atari ST remix)
song.info: Yerzmyey/AY-Riders composed the original version of this tune on the ZX Spectrum for Hooy-Program's demo Dizzzruptor. I felt like it could use another melody line, some timer effects and digidrums. Thank you Micha≈Ç for letting me remix the tune. The tune is included in my music demo Meet !Cube. Editor: maxYMiser Release date: SillyVenture 2012
